abstract.p: Sal Catalano, Jason Lellos and Jeff Silverstein - executives from FUEL North America in New York, part of Messner Vetere Berger McNamee Schmetterer/Euro RSCG - leave to form Catalano Lellos & Silverstein, agency specializing in integrated marketing and brand consulting (S)

block.p: Sal Catalano, Jason Lellos and Jeff Silverstein -- three executives from FUEL North America in New York, part of Messner Vetere Berger McNamee Schmetterer/Euro RSCG -- have left to form their own agency specializing in integrated marketing and brand consulting. Catalano Lellos & Silverstein in New York has eight employees working for clients like CarDay.com.

Sal Catalano, Jason Lellos and Jeff Silverstein -- three executives from FUEL North America in New York, part of Messner Vetere Berger McNamee Schmetterer/Euro RSCG -- have left to form their own agency specializing in integrated marketing and brand consulting. Catalano Lellos & Silverstein in New York has eight employees working for clients like CarDay.com.

Mr. Catalano, 31, had been a group account director at FUEL; Mr. Lellos, 35, had been group interactive creative director; and Mr. Silverstein, 31, had been interactive media director. Messner Vetere is part of the Euro RSCG Worldwide unit of Havas Advertising.
